page.title: 19STRACHAN SCHOOL & COMMUNITY
page.content: Links are fostered between school and community in the following ways. Parents organise a{rota of helpers}to assist in the school for an hour on Tuesdays & Thursdays. The school invites people in the area to{informal little performances arising from their work and generally serve tea also. { Seasonal celebrations}(harvest,xmas etc)are shared. There is a{PTA}in which all parents take a very active part. In June once a week{next years intake come into school for the morning. Parents and pre-school children often {join in outings and excursions. Plans are being made to set up a {series of walks,events and excursions for anyone interested in the area after school next summer by a sub- PTA committee.
